thread.title: BRIEF-Qualcomm Says 2 Costumers To Move Away If Deal With Broadcom Moves Forward‍​

title: BRIEF-Qualcomm Says 2 Costumers To Move Away If Deal With Broadcom Moves Forward‍​
text:
52 AM / Updated 8 minutes ago BRIEF-Qualcomm Says 2 Costumers To Move Away If Deal With Broadcom Moves Forward‍​ Reuters Staff 1 Min Read 
Feb 9 (Reuters) - Qualcomm Inc : 
* QUALCOMM - TWO CUSTOMERS PROVIDING CHIPSET REVENUE OF OVER $1 BILLION EACH PER YEAR STATED THEY ARE LIKELY TO MOVE DESIGNS AWAY FROM CO IF DEAL WITH BROADCOM MOVES FORWARD‍​ 
* QUALCOMM - “WE BELIEVE BROADCOM‘S STRATEGY IS MAINLY TO TRADE LICENCING REVENUE FOR CHIP SHARE AT HIGHER PRICES” 
* QUALCOMM - ANY POSSIBLE DEAL APPROVAL WOULD REQUIRE “SIGNIFICANT AND COMPLEX DIVESTITURES” AS WELL AS RESTRICTIONS ON THE COMBINED ENTITY‘S FUTURE OPERATIONS 
* QUALCOMM INC - PROPOSED BROADCOM-QUALCOMM DEAL RAISES “FAR MORE SIGNIFICANT COMPETITIVE CONCERNS” VERSUS QUALCOMM-NXP DEAL‍​ 
* QUALCOMM INC - IN LAST FIVE YEARS, "SEVERAL LARGE, COMPLEX INTERNATIONAL MERGERS" INVOLVING MULTIPLE REGULATORS HAVE TAKEN OVER 18 MONTHS‍​ Source text : ( bit.ly/2EewnIh ) Further company coverage:
